snippet: A federal judge in New Orleans on Friday approved a sweeping consent decree with the city’s Police Department, one of the most ambitious blueprints for a police overhaul in the country in years.
abstract: Judge Susie Morgan of Federal District Court in New Orleans approves sweeping consent decree with city’s Police Department, one of most ambitious blueprints for a police overhaul in the country in years.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in New Orleans on Friday approved a sweeping consent decree with the city’s Police Department, one of the most ambitious blueprints for a police overhaul in the country in years.

headline.main: Louisiana: New Orleans Rethinks Deal on Police
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: New Orleans Rethinks Deal On Police
